channel.title: [PI] Help with a bit of code

item.title: [PI] Help with a bit of code
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:4, topic:436757”][quote author=13lack drag link=topic=539474.msg3948494#msg3948494 date=1332094919]

You need an “if” statement before you can have an “else if” statement. Just like the error code says 'else' without 'if'

At the very top of the case, there is an if statement.
[/quote]

Post the whole statement for us to see it.[/quote]

There i posted the whole case

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help with a bit of code

item.title: [PI] Help with a bit of code
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“13lack drag, post:3, topic:436757”][quote author=xneonx link=topic=539474.msg3948421#msg3948421 date=1332092642]
You need an “if” statement before you can have an “else if” statement. Just like the error code says 'else' without 'if'
[/quote]

At the very top of the case, there is an if statement.[/quote]

Post the whole statement for us to see it.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help with a bit of code

item.title: [PI] Help with a bit of code
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

xneonx:

You need an “if” statement before you can have an “else if” statement. Just like the error code says 'else' without 'if'

At the very top of the case, there is an if statement.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help with a bit of code

item.title: [PI] Help with a bit of code
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

You need an “if” statement before you can have an “else if” statement. Just like the error code says 'else' without 'if'

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Help with a bit of code

item.title: [PI] Help with a bit of code
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

Recently, I added prestiging to my server. Everything has turned out fine, the saving, dialogues, shops, but i’ve ran across one error.

Here is the code.

[code]//PRESTIGING
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 346) {
for (int i = 0; i <21; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
if (c.playerLevel[i] == 99 && c.prestige > 10) {

c.playerLevel[i] = 1;
c.playerXP[i] = 0;
c.playerLevel[3] = 10;
c.playerXP[3] = 1155;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
c.prestige += 1;
c.prestigeTokens += 3;

}
} else { 
c.sendMessage("You are either 10th prestige, do not have all 99's, or you have gear on.");

}[/code]

I put that under case 9157: under clickingbuttons.java and I get some errors.

Here is case 9157:

[code] case 9157://barrows tele to tunnels
if(c.dialogueAction == 1) {
int r = 4;
//int r = Misc.random(3);
switch® {
case 0:
c.getPA().movePlayer(3534, 9677, 0);
break;

					case 1:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3534, 9712, 0);
						break;
					
					case 2:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3568, 9712, 0);
						break;
					
					case 3:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3568, 9677, 0);
						break;
					case 4:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3551, 9694, 0);
						break;
				}
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 2) {
				c.getPA().movePlayer(2507, 4717, 0);		
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 5) {
				c.getSlayer().giveTask();
                            } else if(c.dialogueAction == 52) {
                            if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 40000000)) {
                            c.sendMessage("you don't have enough money");
                            c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
                                            break;
                                            }
                                    c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomMazeRewards(), 1);
                                    c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomMazeRewards(), 1);
                                    c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomMazeRewards(), 1);
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2880, 10199, 1);
                                    c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 40000000);
                                    c.sendMessage("You have completed the maze congratulations!");
                            } else if (c.dialogueAction == 62) {
                            if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 40000000)) {
                                    c.sendMessage("you don't have enough money to pay him");
                                    c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
                                            break;
                                            }
                                    c.getPA().movePlayer(2405, 9426, 0);
                                    c.sendMessage("I highly doubt you will make it out alive!");
				int skillp = 5;
				int levelp = 1;
				c.getPA().refreshSkill(skillp);

//dungeoneering bosses npc’s
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 82) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2357, 9908, 0);
c.sendMessage(“Good luck, ill miss you!”);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 92) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3048, 9581, 0);
c.sendMessage(“Hurry up, I’m hungry.”);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 102) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2463, 4774,0);
c.sendMessage(“If you dont bring food, you are screwed.”);
//end
//prestige
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 346) {
for (int i = 0; i <21; i++) {
for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
if (c.playerLevel[i] == 99 && c.prestige > 10) {

c.playerLevel[i] = 1;
c.playerXP[i] = 0;
c.playerLevel[3] = 10;
c.playerXP[3] = 1155;
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
c.prestige += 1;
c.prestigeTokens += 3;

}
} else { 
c.sendMessage("You are either 10th prestige, do not have all 99's, or you have gear on.");

}
//END OF PRESTIGE
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 6) {
c.getSlayer().giveTask2();
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 7) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3088,3933,0,“modern”);
c.sendMessage(“NOTE: You are now in the wilderness…”);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 50) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(2661,3307,0,“modern”);
c.sendMessage(“This is pvp”);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 51) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3007,3631,0,“modern”);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 8) {
c.getPA().resetBarrows();
c.sendMessage(“Your barrows have been reset.”);
} else if (c.dialogueAction == 13) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(1762, 5180, 0);
c.dialogueAction = -1;
}
else if (c.dialogueAction == 27) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3210, 3424, 0);
c.monkeyk0ed = 0;
c.Jail = false;
c.forcedText = “I swear to god that i will never break the rules anymore!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
}
c.dialogueAction = 0;
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
break;
[/code]

In the case above, the code is located under //prestige
